p: This opinion paper was not meant to present exhaustive information on COVID-19 diagnosis, but rather to make an overview of currently available technologies in the academic and commercial settings for laboratory and PoC testing. For excellent reviews on strategies for COVID-19 diagnosis, we refer the readers to Cheng et al. ( 6), Tang et al. ( 7), and Udugama et al. ( 11).
